thread.title: Gwen Stefani Debuts Emotional Breakup Song After Gavin Rossdale Split
thread.title_full: Gwen Stefani Debuts Emotional Breakup Song After Gavin Rossdale Split

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Gwen Stefani Debuts Emotional Breakup Song After Gavin Rossdale Split
text:
Comments The No Doubt lead vocalist performs a brand new song 'Used to love You' during a solo concert at Hammerstein Ballroom in New York. 
Gwen Stefani introduced a new song during a solo concert on Saturday, October 17 in New York City. The No Doubt frontwoman treated concertgoers at Manhattan Center's Hammerstein Ballroom to an emotional ballad called "Used to Love You". "I just want to share a song that I wrote recently," introduced the 46-year-old female singer who just split from her husband Gavin Rossdale . The mother of three said of the J.R. Rotem-produced track, "This song is really special. I think this is gonna be the new single." The breakup lyrics include, "I don't know why I cry / But I think it's cause I remember for the first time / Since I hated you / That I used to love you / I thought I was the best thing that ever happened to you / I guess nobody taught you how to love."
